title: Product Quality Does Not Match Description
description: The received products do not match the quality specifications mentioned in the order. Several units have manufacturing defects.
descriptionAr: المنتجات المستلمة لا تطابق مواصفات الجودة المذكورة في الطلب. عدة وحدات بها عيوب تصنيع.

title: Delayed Shipment
description: Order was shipped 5 days later than the agreed delivery date.
descriptionAr: تم شحن الطلب بعد 5 أيام من تاريخ التسليم المتفق عليه.
supplierResponse: We apologize for the delay. It was due to unexpected customs clearance issues. We have provided a 5% discount as compensation.
